import '../styles/ItemCard.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' const DeleteItems = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const{id,image,name,description,price} = props.item var item_id = props.item.id const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(""); const api = "http://localhost:8081/api/v1/item/" const handleSubmit = (event) => { axios.delete(api + id) .then((response) => navigate("/Deletepage")) .catch((error) => setErrorMessage(error));; } return(
{image}
Name: {name}
Description: {description}
Price: Â£ {price}
{errorMessage}
) } export default DeleteItems
